thread.title: Pope Francis Sends Encyclical To Republicans In Congress (VIDEO)
thread.title_full: Pope Francis Sends Encyclical To Republicans In Congress (VIDEO)

title: Pope Francis Sends Encyclical To Republicans In Congress (VIDEO)
text:
17 Pope Francis Sends Encyclical To Republicans In Congress (VIDEO) 
Clean Technica: To highlight the plea by Pope Francis, spiritual leader of the world’s 1.2 billion Roman Catholics, that all people of good will respond to the moral imperative of solving climate change, faith leaders today hand-delivered “Laudato Si’,” the Pope’s first complete encyclical to the faithful, to all Catholic members of the US Congress. The distribution of these 160-page books precedes the Pope’s planned address to Congress on September 24.
